## ScrollbarPair.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `ScrollbarPair` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(workspace: WorkspaceSvg, addHorizontal?: boolean, addVertical?: boolean, opt_class?: string, opt_margin?: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg_class.md) | Workspace to bind the scrollbars to. |
|  addHorizontal | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether to add a horizontal scrollbar. Defaults to true. |
|  addVertical | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether to add a vertical scrollbar. Defaults to true. |
|  opt\_class | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A class to be applied to these scrollbars. |
|  opt\_margin | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The margin to apply to these scrollbars. |
